line_1: I saw the Wanton, where I stoop'd to sup,
line_2: And half resolv'd to drown me in the Cup;

line_1: For You surely To-night shall in Paradise Sup.
line_2: Tell your Beads, quoth the Priest, and be fairly truss'd up:

line_1: At night did with his master sup:
line_2: The salt, refresh'd by shaking up,
